: : SharpClaw : :
SharpClaw: It's simple, there is no quick plan that will wipe them out in one strike. Never going to happen like that. This is a war and it will take time.
He moves closer, touching her jaw.
SharpClaw: I'm sorry if there is any lasting pain. I had to make sure I knocked you out.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:KitKat::

She relaxed and transformed into bot form. "I still don't understand. 
What other plan is there that would wipe them out?" she said rubbing 
her jaw.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : SharpClaw : :
> SharpClaw released his hold on KitKat's neck.
> SharpClaw: I did it so we wouldnt lose a good Predacon, with a 
warriors heart like yours, in a futile mission. Your plan would not 
have worked. You may have gotton some of them, but word would have 
spread. Most of them would have taken actions, protecting themselves. 
Then they would have found a vaccine, if they hadn't already. You 
have to know this. I decided you were worth more alive with us then 
dead with the Maximals.
